xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 03 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 09:11 <BogdanVancea> has joined #medsavant 09:12 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 09:13 <bvancea> hello, sdumitriu 09:49 <sdumitriu> Hi bvancea 09:50 <bvancea> how are you? how was the weekend? :P 09:50 <sdumitriu> Not as productive as I hoped 09:50 <sdumitriu> I managed to get a basic DMG build for MedSavant, though 09:51 <bvancea> nice 09:51 <bvancea> :D 10:19 <sdumitriu> So, what are your plans for this week? 10:22 <bvancea> create an first index configuration for the variants 10:22 <bvancea> and connect it to medsavant 10:22 <bvancea> connect the index to medsavant* 10:24 <sdumitriu> OK 10:24 <sdumitriu> But you must make sure the index works decently before trying to connect it 10:24 <bvancea> I want to make a better estimate, so I'll check the code and try make a plan for each day 10:25 <bvancea> hmm... what are you refering to when saying "works decently"? 10:28 <sdumitriu> You can run a query in under a second 10:28 <bvancea> sure 10:29 <bvancea> I'll start with tests then 10:29 <bvancea> and only start actualy integration 10:29 <bvancea> after I get decent results there 10:29 <sdumitriu> Yep 10:29 <sdumitriu> I'll try to get in contact with the other student today 10:30 <sdumitriu> It's been a week already without any sign 10:30 <bvancea> I check the GSOC webpage, he's doing some query parallelization 10:30 <bvancea> checked* 10:30 <sdumitriu> Yes 10:30 <bvancea> perhaps he doesn't have internet at the moment 10:31 <bvancea> is it common for students to not respond to emails during the community bonding period? 10:31 <sdumitriu> No 10:31 <bvancea> so it hasn't happened to you before? 10:31 <sdumitriu> If they do that, they should be kicked out ASAP 10:31 <sdumitriu> Nope 10:32 <bvancea> I see 10:33 <bvancea> and if this student doesn't respond, the slot is effectively wasted? 10:37 <sdumitriu> No, we can get another student 10:37 <sdumitriu> If we do that before the end of the bonding period 10:38 <bvancea> oh, I see 10:39 <bvancea> well, maybe this student will eventually respond 10:42 <bvancea> well, I'll go have dinner 10:42 <bvancea> then write the status email 10:42 <sdumitriu> K 10:42 <bvancea> and start working on the index 10:42 <bvancea> bbl 12:37 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 13:38 <bvancea> Seems like the other student responded :) 13:39 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:49 <bvancea> well, I'm off to shower and then to bed 14:49 <bvancea> good night
